View Sydney Guide » Recently viewed Hostels in Sydney, Australia Show Map Hide Map 87 Sydney Hostels, 87 available Hostels.com brings you the best selection of cheap accommodation in Sydney. Stay in a Sydney hostel in the city centre, central downtown or near the several beaches Manly, Bronte, Coogee or Bondi. For something different stay in hostels in Kings Cross, Glebe or the Rocks. Find a cheap hostel near the train station and then explore Sydney. Whether you are an experienced backpacker or simply just looking for a room for the night, our choice of Sydney hostels will suit you. Featured Sydney hostels are listed at the top of this page.
